mapper.insert: insert into cs_repairs (id, process_user_id, process_user_name, terminal_id, status, repair_price, pay_types, receive_address_id, customer_id, created_at, updated_at, apply_num, cs_repair_marks_id, return_address_id, description ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{processUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{processUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{terminalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{repairPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payTypes,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{receiveAddressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{applyNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csRepairMarksId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{returnAddressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
